page.title: 10Recreation Children Cricket
page.content: The "Rec" is a big field.Children in my class play on the swings,slide,see_ saw,train and rope swing.3 big lime trees to climb.There is a Football and cricket pitch.We have fun in the river ride bikes and ponies,sail,do ballet and judo,play games,learn music etc. In August the Rector has Holiday Happenings,8_11's many activities,wide games,watersports,grass_tobogganing. There are Cubs,Brownies,Scouts,Guides & Ventures.We meet in Scout hut,and go to camp or pack holiday.{Droxford } cricket team play lots of teams.A player can borrow a bat they use the pavilion for home games.If the ball hits a tree trunk,it's a 4,if a tree top then it's 6. It is thought the original Worzel Gummidge scarecrow lived in a field where now there is a bungalow in Station Road.
